patterns: I want to apply for credit card
How do I apply for credit card?
What is the procedure to apply for credit card?
Who can apply for ATM/Debit Card?
responses: Any individual account holder having Savings Bank or Current Account, single, or joint account operated as Either or Survivor / Former or Survivor / Later or Survivor/ Anyone or Survivor / Pensioners, NRE account holders.

patterns: What are the types of accounts in banks?
responses:
a) Checking Account: You can access the account as the saving account but, unlike saving account, you cannot earn interest on this account. The benefit of this account is that there is no limit for withdrawal. 
 b) Saving Account: You can save your money in such account and also earn interest on it. The number of withdrawal is limited and need to maintain the minimum amount of balance in the account to remain active.
 c) Money Market Account: This account gives benefits of both saving and checking accounts. You can withdraw the amount and yet you can earn higher interest on it. This account can be opened with a minimum balance.
 d) CD (Certificate of Deposits) Account: In such account you have to deposit your money for the fixed period of time (5-7 years), and you will earn the interest on it. The rate of interest is decided by the bank, and you cannot withdraw the funds until the fixed period expires.

patterns: What are the different ways you can operate your accounts?
How can I operate my account?
responses:
You can operate your bank accounts in different ways like 
 a) Internet banking 
 b) Telephone or Mobile banking 
 c) Branch or Over the counter service 
 d) ATM ( Automated Teller Machine)

patterns: What is the procedure to deactiviate an account?
responses: To close the account, call your bank, visit the bank in person, or write a letter to their offices. Your bank will have you sign an account closing form to make it official. If you don't withdraw the cash first, then your bank will send you a check when the account has closed.

patterns: I donot have Savings Bank Account with your bank, Can I apply for Gold Loan
responses: Yes, you can open SB Account with our bank and can Apply for Gold Loan. Please visit your nearest Branch.

patterns: My current mobile no. is different from the one registered for SBI Credit Card. How can I change it?
responses:
You can send the following documents: Written & signed application for change in contact number, mentioning the 16 digit card number and the new mobile number. 
Anyone of the following self-attested documents: Residence Address proof as per Card records, ID Proof. 
Please e-mail the above documents to contactchange@bank.com
